title: Create a crosstalk enabled gauge component for a dashboard. — summaryGauge
code: summaryGauge(   data,   statistic = c("count", "sum", "mean", "pct_total", "sum_pct_total", "min", "max",     "quantile", "wt_mean", "sum_ratio"),   column = NULL,   column2 = NULL,   weight = NULL,   selection = NULL,   locale = "navigator.language",   digits = 0,   number_format = c("decimal", "percent", "currency", "unit"),   signDisplay = c("auto", "always", "exceptZero", "negative", "never"),   currency = NULL,   unit = NULL,   quantile = 0.5,   notation = c("standard", "scientific", "engineering", "compact"),   min = NULL,   max = NULL,   color_thresholds = list(domain = c(0.5, 0.8), range = c("red", "gold",     "mediumseagreen")),   accessible_title = NULL,   accessible_desc = NULL,   width = NULL,   height = NULL,   elementId = NULL )

title: Create a crosstalk enabled gauge component for a dashboard. — summaryGauge
text: data Data summarize, normally instance crosstalk::SharedData. statistic statistic compute. Possible vales c("count", "sum", "mean", "pct_total", "sum_pct_total", "min", "max", "quantile", "wt_mean","sum_ratio"). Count default. column statistics, column data summarize. used "count" "pct_total" statistic. column2 Valid statistic = "sum_ratio". column2 column data sum_ratio = sum(column)/sum(column2) weight Valid statistic = "wt_mean". Specifies weight column data. selection Expression select fixed subset data. May logical vector one-sided formula evaluates logical vector. used, key given crosstalk::SharedData must fixed column (row numbers). locale Control number displayed. Valid strings include IETF BCP 47 language tag, string "navigator.language". Default value "navigator.language" digits Number decimal places display, NULL display full precision. number_format == "percent", digits == 0 statistics 0.1234, resulting visualization show "12%". number_format resulting type number display. Options c("decimal", "percent", "currency","unit"). Decimal default. signDisplay display sign number. Possible values : c("auto", "always","exceptZero","negative","never"). Auto default currency string containing ISO 4217 currency code. default value. Full list availble NOTE: value null, number_format reassigned "currency" unit string containing valid unit identifier list Pairs simple units can concatenated "-per-" make compound unit. NOTE: value null, number_format reassigned "unit" quantile number [0,1], specifying quantile use statistic = "quantile". default number 0.5 (.e. median) notation number displayed. Possible vales c("standard", "scientific","engineering","compact"). Standard default. min Minimum numeric value display alongside calculated statistic. default, use 0 statistic %% c("count", "pct_total") use minimum value data otherwise. max Maximum numeric value display alongside calculated statistic. default, use 1 statistic == "pct_total", count statistic == "count" use maximum value data otherwise. color_thresholds list containing two named vectors, domain range. domain series numbers range series colour strings (hex html colour names) value x: x < domain[1] colour == range[1], domain[1] <= x < domain[2] colour == range[2] ... domain[n-1] <= x < domain[n] colour == range[n] domain[n] <= x colour == range[n+1] , length named vector range one item longer length domain. default value color_threshold list(domain = c(0.5,0.8), range = c("red","gold","mediumseagreen")). fix single colour, let color_thresholds = list(domain = c(-Inf), range=c(unused_color,desired_color)) width Optional parameter. Fixed width widget (css units), passed htmlwidgets::createWidget. height Optional parameter. Fixed height widget (css units), passed htmlwidgets::createWidget. elementId Optional parameter. String used define element containing widget, passed htmlwidgets::createWidget.
